text:
Khloe Kardashian is inspired by her sister to stay in shape.

KIM KARDASHIAN CALLS THE FLU AN 'AMAZING DIET'

The 32-year-old reality TV star took to Instagram on Wednesday where she posted a photo of Kim Kardashian wearing a nude-on-nude ensemble, which highlighted her famous figure.

Khloe revealed that it was the 36-year-old “Keeping Up with the Kardashians” star that’s been motivating her to stay fit.

"Well damn... she shut s---t down!!! Hands down best body ever! S--t, I have to get my s--t together. If this isn't motivation, than I don't know what is! Keeks, you look amazing!" she captioned.

It was also on Wednesday when Kim caused some controversy on social media when she joked that the flu was “an amazing diet” and was the reason behind her recent 6 pound weight loss.

FOLLOW US ON FACEBOOK FOR MORE ENTERTAINMENT NEWS

Several tweeters were angry at the mother of two, stating that her reported diet is harmful advice to young fans. Kim’s tweet has since disappeared after the backlash.
title: Khloe Kardashian in awe of sister Kim Kardashian's 'best body ever'
